attributes.action: Ban political parties using e-petitions for political gain
attributes.additional_details:
There is talk of political parties using the e-petitions system to try and bring in legislation.

Legislation should be about the will of the people and any mention of e-petitions should be banned from political party literature as this would give a proposal an unfair advantage over that of a private individual/group without funds to send out leaflets and put up posters for their petition.
